languages.text: "Не пытайся постичь смысл моих деяний, ничтожное существо. Крударах должен был открыть мне дорогу к могуществу, о котором Опустошительная буря могла только мечтать. Мне предначертано величие... и я заберу его!"

"Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"
languages.original_text: "Не пытайся постичь смысл моих деяний, ничтожное существо. Крударах должен был открыть мне дорогу к могуществу, о котором Опустошительная буря могла только мечтать. Мне предначертано величие... и я заберу его!"

traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: « N'essayez pas de comprendre mes aspirations, misérable créature, car elles vous dépassent. Crudarach était la clé qui m'aurait permis d'exploiter des puissances dont la Tempête Ravageuse ne pouvait que rêver. C'est à moi que doit revenir la couronne, et je m'en emparerai ! »
languages.original_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"

traits.locale_text: « N'essayez pas de comprendre mes aspirations, misérable créature, car elles vous dépassent. Crudarach était la clé qui m'aurait permis d'exploiter des puissances dont la Tempête Ravageuse ne pouvait que rêver. C'est à moi que doit revenir la couronne, et je m'en emparerai ! »
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: “别再费力去理解我为什么要这么做了，可怜的虫子。克鲁达拉赫是我获得力量的关键，我会获得狂风阴谋团所有人梦寐以求的力量。它的力量只属于我，我一定会得到它！”
languages.original_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"

traits.locale_text: “别再费力去理解我为什么要这么做了，可怜的虫子。克鲁达拉赫是我获得力量的关键，我会获得狂风阴谋团所有人梦寐以求的力量。它的力量只属于我，我一定会得到它！”
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: "Erspart Euch den vergeblichen Kampf, die Bedeutung hinter meinen Taten ergründen zu wollen, Abschaum. Crudarach sollte mein Schlüssel zu einer Macht sein, von welcher der plündernde Sturm nur träumen kann. Nur mir allein steht es zu, wahre Größe zu erlangen, und ich werde sie erlangen!"
languages.original_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"

traits.locale_text: "Erspart Euch den vergeblichen Kampf, die Bedeutung hinter meinen Taten ergründen zu wollen, Abschaum. Crudarach sollte mein Schlüssel zu einer Macht sein, von welcher der plündernde Sturm nur träumen kann. Nur mir allein steht es zu, wahre Größe zu erlangen, und ich werde sie erlangen!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: «No intentes entender el significado de mis acciones, despreciable criatura. Crudarach era la clave para conseguir un poder que ni la Tempestad Asoladora podría imaginar. ¡Solo yo puedo conseguir la soberanía, y así lo haré!».
languages.original_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"

traits.locale_text: «No intentes entender el significado de mis acciones, despreciable criatura. Crudarach era la clave para conseguir un poder que ni la Tempestad Asoladora podría imaginar. ¡Solo yo puedo conseguir la soberanía, y así lo haré!».
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: 「私の行動の裏に隠れた意味を理解しようと足掻くな、哀れな生き物よ。クルダラは、リーヴィング・テンペストが夢見ることしかできなかった力を与える鍵となるはずだった。威厳を奪えるのは私のみ。もちろん奪ってやるさ！」
languages.original_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の行動の裏に隠れた意味を理解しようと足掻くな、哀れな生き物よ。クルダラは、リーヴィング・テンペストが夢見ることしかできなかった力を与える鍵となるはずだった。威厳を奪えるのは私のみ。もちろん奪ってやるさ！」
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: "Eylemlerimin arkasında yatan anlamı algılamaya çalışman boşuna sefil yaratık. Crudarach, Müfteris Kasırga'nın yalnızca hayallerinde görebileceği bir gücü elde etmemi sağlayan anahtardı. Egemenlik; onu ele geçirmemi bekliyor, ben de tam olarak bunu yapacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Spare yourself the struggle of comprehending the meaning behind my deeds, wretched creature. Crudarach was to be my key to power the likes of which the Reaving Tempest could only dream of. Majesty is mine alone to claim, and I will claim it!"

traits.locale_text: "Eylemlerimin arkasında yatan anlamı algılamaya boşuna uğraşma seni sefil yaratık. Crudarach, Müfteris Kasırga'nın yalnızca hayallerinde görebileceği bir gücü elde etmemi sağlayan anahtardı. Egemenlik onu ele geçirmemi bekliyor, ben de tam olarak bunu yapacağım!"
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit
